text: Novoabdrakhmanovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Pervomaysky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 38 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 52 km from Sterlitamak, 4 km from Pervomayskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Novoabdrakhmanovo
